results.title: Prison Songs
results.brief_description: Prison Songs is a documentary musical made in 2014, during the last days of the operation of Darwin’s Berrimah Prison – the largest correctional centre in the NT.

constellations_other.name: Black documentary and truth telling
constellations_other.description: Essie Coffey was a trailblazer of Indigenous filmmaking, being the first Aboriginal woman to direct a documentary. The film spotlights the outspoken voice Coffey utilised to convey the realities faced by Aboriginal people and to encourage resistance to assimilation.

results.description: Prison Songs is a documentary musical made in 2014, during the last days of the operation of Darwin’s Berrimah Prison – the largest correctional centre in the NT.
description_for_label: Prison Songs is a documentary musical made in 2014, during the last days of the operation of Darwin’s Berrimah Prison – the largest correctional centre in the NT.

results.title: Pride and Prejudice and Zombies
results.brief_description: A zombie outbreak has fallen upon the land in this reimagining of Jane Austen’s classic tale of the tangled relationships between lovers from different social classes in 19th-century England.

constellations_other.name: The Hatfield House rules
constellations_other.description: The shooting location of The Favourite, Hatfield House, has appeared in a number of other iconic works.

results.description: A zombie outbreak has fallen upon the land in this reimagining of Jane Austen’s classic tale of the tangled relationships between lovers from different social classes in 19th century England. Feisty heroine Elizabeth Bennet is a master of martial arts and weaponry and the handsome Mr. Darcy is a fierce zombie killer, yet the epitome of upper class prejudice. As the zombie outbreak intensifies, they must swallow their pride and join forces on the blood-soaked battlefield in order to conquer the undead once and for all.
description_for_label: A zombie outbreak has fallen upon the land in this reimagining of Jane Austen’s classic tale of the tangled relationships between lovers from different social classes in 19th century England. Feisty heroine Elizabeth Bennet is a master of martial arts and weaponry and the handsome Mr. Darcy is a fierce zombie killer, yet the epitome of upper class prejudice. As the zombie outbreak intensifies, they must swallow their pride and join forces on the blood-soaked battlefield in order to conquer the undead once and for all.

Pride and Prejudice and Zombies - Bloody Good Sneak Peek

results.title: Portraits in Dramatic Time
results.creator_credit: David Michalek, Paul Warner and Moving Portrait
results.brief_description: A series of 40 art films created by artist David Michalek featuring performances of theater artists and actors of all genres and nationalities both well-known and under-recognized.

constellations_other.name: Now watch this
constellations_other.description: In a video-saturated world, how do you keep focus? Do you keep a close eye on one thing, or step back and watch the parade of images go by, to see the whole thing?

results.creator_credit_for_label: David Michalek, Paul Warner and Moving Portrait
results.description: A series of 40 art films created by artist David Michalek featuring performances of theater artists and actors of all genres and nationalities both well-known and under-recognised.
description_for_label: A series of 40 art films created by artist David Michalek featuring performances of theater artists and actors of all genres and nationalities both well-known and under-recognised.

results.title: Polar
results.headline_credit: Germany and United States of America, 2019
results.brief_description: When a retiring assassin realizes that he is the target of a hit, he winds up back in the game going head to head with a gang of younger, ruthless killers.

constellations_other.name: Cleverman
constellations_other.description: Cleverman is dystopian sci-fi with a difference. With a predominantly Indigenous cast and senior crew, the series explores Aboriginal origin stories in a contemporary context, while examining themes of class, racism and power.

results.description: When a retiring assassin realizes that he is the target of a hit, he winds up back in the game going head to head with a gang of younger, ruthless killers.
description_for_label: When a retiring assassin realizes that he is the target of a hit, he winds up back in the game going head to head with a gang of younger, ruthless killers.

results.title: Pokémon Detective Pikachu
results.headline_credit: Japan and United States of America, 2019
results.brief_description: In a world where people collect pocket-size monsters (Pokémon) to do battle, a boy comes across an intelligent monster who seeks to be a detective.

constellations_other.name: Explosive footage
constellations_other.description: How the fireballs in the opening scene of Blade Runner connect to Fatboy Slim and Detective Pikachu.

constellations_other.name: Neo-Noir
constellations_other.description: Blade Runner's retro-futurist setting lends it a timeless quality, while also connecting it to the past and the future.

results.description: In a world where people collect pocket-size monsters (Pokémon) to do battle, a boy comes across an intelligent monster who seeks to be a detective.
description_for_label: In a world where people collect pocket-size monsters (Pokémon) to do battle, a boy comes across an intelligent monster who seeks to be a detective.

video_links.name: POKÉMON Detective Pikachu - Destiny  - Warner Bros. UK

results.title: Pleasantville
results.brief_description: Geeky David and his popular twin Jennifer get sucked into a black-and-white 1950s TV sitcom world and find it anything but peachy keen. When Jennifer’s modern attitude disrupts Pleasantville’s peaceful but boring routine, she literally brings color into its life.

constellations_other.name: 1950s television
constellations_other.description: "Good evening ... and welcome to television." Bruce Gyngell’s famous words launched television in Australia in 1956 on Sydney’s TCN9, with the medium finally arriving in the country towards the later end of the decade.

results.description: Geeky teenager David and his popular twin sister, Jennifer, get sucked into the black-and-white world of a 1950s TV sitcom called “Pleasantville,” and find a world where everything is peachy keen all the time. But when Jennifer’s modern attitude disrupts Pleasantville’s peaceful but boring routine, she literally brings color into its life.
description_for_label: Geeky teenager David and his popular twin sister, Jennifer, get sucked into the black-and-white world of a 1950s TV sitcom called “Pleasantville,” and find a world where everything is peachy keen all the time. But when Jennifer’s modern attitude disrupts Pleasantville’s peaceful but boring routine, she literally brings color into its life.

results.title: Pingu
results.creator_credit: Silvio Mazzola, HiT Entertainment and Trickfilm
results.brief_description: Pingu is a BAFTA award-winning British-Swiss stop-motion claymated television series created by Otmar Gutmann.

constellations_other.name: Storytime animated
constellations_other.description: Abra Cadabra was the world's first stereoscopic 3D film, but animators and filmmakers had experimented with the technology far earlier and continue to use other older techniques like stop-motion animation.

results.description: Playful penguin Pingu lives with his family in Antarctica, where he often finds himself caught up in mischievous high jinks with his pal Robby.
description_for_label: Playful penguin Pingu lives with his family in Antarctica, where he often finds himself caught up in mischievous high jinks with his pal Robby.

results.title: Ping Pong
results.brief_description: Ping Pong is a 2002 sports film directed by Japanese filmmaker Fumihiko Sori. It is based on Taiyō Matsumoto’s manga of the same name and is about the friendship between two high school table tennis players.

constellations_other.name: The first home console and the art of ping pong
constellations_other.description: An exploration of tennis and ping pong throughout the moving image.

results.description: As children, the introverted Smile was being bullied by a gang of kids until the brash Peco comes by and chases all of them them away. Peco then takes Smile under his wings and teaches him how to play the game of ping pong. From there a life long best friend relationship comes into existence between these two polar opposite kids. Fast forward a decade later, these two best friends try to deal with their own inner turmoils, as they move further and further into the regional ping pong tournament. Peco has to overcome a knee injury while trying to rediscover the fun aspects of the game of Ping Pong. Meanwhile, Smile now seems to have gained the killer instinct by going through a rigorous training regiment instilled by his high school coach. As the tournament progresses it becomes more likely that these two best friends will face off against each in the final match.
description_for_label: As children, the introverted Smile was being bullied by a gang of kids until the brash Peco comes by and chases all of them them away. Peco then takes Smile under his wings and teaches him how to play the game of ping pong. From there a life long best friend relationship comes into existence between these two polar opposite kids. Fast forward a decade later, these two best friends try to deal with their own inner turmoils, as they move further and further into the regional ping pong tournament. Peco has to overcome a knee injury while trying to rediscover the fun aspects of the game of Ping Pong. Meanwhile, Smile now seems to have gained the killer instinct by going through a rigorous training regiment instilled by his high school coach. As the tournament progresses it becomes more likely that these two best friends will face off against each in the final match.

results.title: Picnic at Hanging Rock
results.brief_description: Peter Weir’s Australian New Wave classic about a group of students who mysteriously disappear as an eerie but scenic volcanic formation called Hanging Rock.

constellations_other.name: Clothing, country, character
constellations_other.description: Edie Kurzer's costume design work on Judy & Punch and Picnic at Hanging Rock is part of a larger trend in Australian films and TV series.

constellations_other.name: Inspired design and costume sketches
constellations_other.description: Costume designers Edie Kurzer and Alice Babidge have worked on some of the most acclaimed Australian and international films and TV, joining the ranks of fellow Australians creatives.

results.description: In the early 1900s, Miranda attends a girls boarding school in Australia. One Valentine’s Day, the school’s typically strict headmistress treats the girls to a picnic field trip to an unusual but scenic volcanic formation called Hanging Rock. Despite rules against it, Miranda and several other girls venture off. It’s not until the end of the day that the faculty realizes the girls and one of the teachers have disappeared mysteriously.
description_for_label: In the early 1900s, Miranda attends a girls boarding school in Australia. One Valentine’s Day, the school’s typically strict headmistress treats the girls to a picnic field trip to an unusual but scenic volcanic formation called Hanging Rock. Despite rules against it, Miranda and several other girls venture off. It’s not until the end of the day that the faculty realizes the girls and one of the teachers have disappeared mysteriously.

video_links.name: Peter Weir on Picnic at Hanging Rock

results.title: Peter Rabbit
results.creator_credit: Michael Furniss, Rob Lieber and Sony Pictures Animation
results.headline_credit: Australia, United Kingdom and United States of America, 2018
results.brief_description: Peter Rabbit’s feud with Mr. McGregor escalates to greater heights than ever before as they rival for the affections of the warm-hearted animal lover who lives next door.

constellations_other.name: Flipping through the evolution of animation
constellations_other.description: Animation has come a long way since flip books were popular. These optical toys gave the illusion of movement, but now whole films and special effects are animated entirely through computers.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Michael Furniss, Rob Lieber and Sony Pictures Animation
